long_description: arredoteam opera da anni nel campo dell'arredamento per uffici e negozi, e nel settore dei sistemi di magazzinaggio. arredoteam tratta i migliori e più importanti marchi per ogni settore di attività, tra i quali.

generated_description: arredoteam srl is an italian company that specializes in industrial furniture, shelving systems, and shop fittings. they offer a range of products including industrial shelving, soppalchi and shelving units, and furniture for stores. the company has been operating for years in the field of office and store furniture and storage systems. arredoteam has gained a prestigious position in the market through targeted commercial policies and a complete service that includes logistics and technical advice, free quotes, installation, and post-sales assistance. they have a showroom in livorno and a warehouse for storage materials ready for delivery. the ferretto group offers modular industrial shelves and space optimization solutions.
